title: Double murder probe after two 17-year-olds stabbed
text:
Two 17-year-old boys have died after a stabbing.

Emergency services were called to an address in Archford Croft, Emerson Valley, Milton Keynes, shortly before midnight on Saturday, Thames Valley Police said.

One of the victims died at the scene and the other was taken to hospital with serious injuries but died later.

The victims’ next of kin have been told.

Two men were injured in the incident, and are in hospital with serious but non-life-threatening injuries.

No arrests have been made.

The fatal stabbings took place in Archford Croft, Milton Keynes (Google StreetView/PA)

* DOUBLE MURDER INVESTIGATION *



We have launched a double murder investigation in Milton Keynes after two 17-year-old boys died in a stabbing incident overnight.



It occurred at around midnight in Archford Croft, Emerson Valley.



Full details here ➡️ https://t.co/kEWyH739F8 pic.twitter.com/ocpeQdEwuQ — TVP Milton Keynes (@tvp_mk) October 20, 2019

Detective Chief Superintendent Ian Hunter urged witnesses to come forward following the “shocking” incident.

He said: “I would like to speak to anyone who has any information which could help with our inquiries, or anyone who witnessed any suspicious activity in the area of Archford Croft.

“Even if you think details may be insignificant, please come forward and speak to police.”
description: Emergency services were called to an address in Milton Keynes shortly before midnight on Saturday.
